name: Liberty State
description:
Control System

[Left Arrow] or [A]: move left

[Right Arrow] or [D]: move right

What is this?

This game is my (very, very late) answer to makega.me's July pageant. Bob Marley's point of view about Buffalo Soldiers' saga is translated in a game form.

Donations will be strictly used to provide me food.

Hope you either enjoy or hate it.
